text: Kasonero, ki onon mexonand, xud [ʙo parastiş va nakukorī] vasilae [ʙaroi taqarruʙ] ʙa Parvardigoraşon meçūjand [va dar raqoʙatand, to ʙidonand] kadom jak az az onon [ʙa parastişi Alloh taolo] nazdiktarand va ʙa rahmataş umedvorand va az azoʙaş metarsand; [caro ki] ʙe tardid, azoʙi Parvardigorat hamvora şoistai parhez ast
